page.title: 04Amenities in Lawhitton
page.content: The population of Lawhitton is about 110.There are few amenities in Lawhitton.Transport is very poor. There are no buses except those which take the children to school in Launceston. People in the area need a car if they are to get anywhere. Most people believe that there should be a better service. In Lawhitton there isn't a shop or a Post Office. The Post Office closed a few years ago because it was uneconomical. To go shopping most people come into Launceston.There is a beautiful church in Lawhitton which was built in the twelfth century. It has a very large graveyard. Most inhabitants of Lawhitton like the peaceful atmosphere but the younger people wish there was more to do.
